subject: Tennis
Italian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Murray improved his record on clay this year to 10-0 with a 6-4, 6-3 win over Jeremy Chardy in his opening match at the Italian Open in Rome.
snippet: Murray improved his record on clay this year to 10-0 with a 6-4, 6-3 win over Jeremy Chardy in his opening match at the Italian Open in Rome.
